projects.title: Fendi 3D Experience
projects.shortDescription: Immersive 3D luxury fashion experience with advanced modeling and interactive elements.
projects.fullDescription: A cutting-edge 3D web experience for Fendi, combining high-end fashion visualization with interactive storytelling. Built with advanced 3D modeling techniques and optimized for web performance.
implementation: Created highly detailed 3D models using Blender with industry-standard topology
Implemented real-time material and lighting systems with Substance Painter
Optimized 3D assets for web performance using compression and LOD techniques
Built interactive product showcases with smooth camera transitions and animations

projects.title: Executive Spaces
projects.shortDescription: Corporate workspace management platform with dynamic content and admin functionality.
projects.fullDescription: A comprehensive workspace management solution designed for executive environments, featuring dynamic content management, booking systems, and administrative dashboards.
implementation: Developed responsive frontend with ScrollMagic for engaging scroll-based animations
Built robust backend API with PHP and MySQL for data management
Implemented secure admin panel with role-based access control
Created dynamic booking system with real-time availability updates

projects.title: Games Catalog Platform
projects.shortDescription: Modern gaming discovery platform with advanced filtering and recommendation systems.
projects.fullDescription: A sophisticated gaming platform that helps users discover, review, and track their favorite games with intelligent recommendation algorithms and social features.
implementation: Built type-safe frontend with React and TypeScript for enhanced developer experience
Developed RESTful API with Express.js and comprehensive error handling
Implemented real-time features using Socket.io for live user interactions
Created intelligent recommendation system based on user preferences and behavior

projects.title: Portfolio Website v2
projects.shortDescription: High-performance portfolio with 3D elements and advanced animations.
projects.fullDescription: A cutting-edge portfolio website showcasing modern web development techniques, featuring 3D elements, advanced animations, and optimized performance.
implementation: Leveraged Next.js 14 with App Router for optimal performance and SEO
Integrated complex 3D scenes with Three.js and optimized rendering pipeline
Created smooth scroll-based animations using GSAP and ScrollTrigger
Implemented responsive design system with Tailwind CSS and custom components

projects.title: React Native Finance App
projects.shortDescription: Cross-platform financial management app with real-time data and secure transactions.
projects.fullDescription: A comprehensive financial management application built for iOS and Android, featuring real-time market data, secure transactions, and intuitive user experience.
implementation: Developed cross-platform mobile app with React Native and TypeScript
Integrated Firebase for real-time data synchronization and authentication
Implemented secure payment processing using Stripe API with PCI compliance
Created responsive UI components with smooth animations and gestures

projects.title: E-Commerce Dashboard
projects.shortDescription: Comprehensive analytics dashboard for e-commerce platforms with real-time insights.
projects.fullDescription: A powerful analytics and management dashboard designed for e-commerce businesses, providing real-time insights, inventory management, and sales optimization tools.
implementation: Built responsive dashboard interface with Vue.js and component-based architecture
Developed high-performance backend with Node.js and PostgreSQL for data processing
Implemented real-time analytics using WebSockets and Redis for caching
Created interactive data visualizations with Chart.js and custom D3.js components
